sentences.sContent: I think so. We certainly don't want a highjack to happen on the plane today.
sentences.sContent_eng: I think so. We certainly don't want a highjack to happen on the plane today.
sentences.sCn: 我想是的。我们当然不希望在今天的飞机上发生劫机事件。
